title: Mac Studio vs MacBook Pro (2021): How powerful is Appleâ€™s new desktop?
content:
Apple Silicon has been at the core of many of Apple’s new products in the last couple of years, and it’s driven a major evolution of those products. Most recently, Apple announced the Mac Studio, an incredibly powerful desktop PC powered by the brand-new Apple M1 Ultra or the M1 Max. The M1 Max also

The post Mac Studio vs MacBook Pro (2021): How powerful is Apple’s new desktop? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Mac Studio comes with the beastly M1 Ultra processor, but is it worth getting over the MacBook Pro? We break it down for you.
